nav.div: School District of Black River Falls » COVID-19 Information

div.span: School District of Black River Falls response to COVID-19. Here is all the information we have published about our district closing due to COVID-19. Additionally, there are resources to help inform you about this virus.

a.title: FAQ's for Safer At Home Order

br.a: Governor Evers Safer at Home FAQ's Updated 4-16-2020

br.span:
The following are the distribution sites/routes for lunch pickup.
Distribution Site/Route 11:00am-12:00pm
Castle Hill
Gebhardt School
German Mobile Home Park
Hatfield Fire Station
High School
Hixton Village Hall
HoChungra Head Start
Little Norway Church
Manchester Town Shop
Millston Community Center
Oak Ridge Mobile Home Park
Parkland Village (behind Perkins)
Parkland Village East
Red Creek
Sand Pillow Head Start
If you'd like to update us on your breakfast and lunch status please call the district office at 715-284-4357 ext. 1102
This is a good one from the CDC: CDC Information
This is a little video that would be great to show elementary students: Elementary Students Video
This is the most recent CDC briefing update (March 14th): CDC Update
